UniprotID	Q16873
Accession	Q16873;Q8N6P0;Q9UC73;Q9UD18
EntryName	LTC4S_HUMAN
ProteinName	Leukotriene C4 synthase (LTC4 synthase) (EC 4.4.1.20) (Glutathione S-transferase LTC4) (EC 2.5.1.-) (Leukotriene-C(4) synthase) (Leukotriene-C4 synthase)
GeneName	LTC4S
Length	150
Function	Catalyzes the conjugation of leukotriene A4 with reduced glutathione (GSH) to form leukotriene C4 with high specificity (PubMed:23409838, PubMed:27365393, PubMed:27791009, PubMed:7937884, PubMed:9153254). Can also catalyze the transfer of a glutathionyl group from glutathione (GSH) to 13(S),14(S)-epoxy-docosahexaenoic acid to form maresin conjugate in tissue regeneration 1 (MCTR1), a bioactive lipid mediator that possess potent anti-inflammatory and proresolving actions (PubMed:27791009).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus outer membrane; Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Nucleus membrane
Disorder	0.0093,0.0148,0.0096,0.0072,0.0093,0.0079,0.0064,0.0052,0.0065,0.0066,0.0056,0.0044,0.0042,0.0029,0.0028,0.0028,0.0022,0.0030,0.0035,0.0040,0.0046,0.0051,0.0032,0.0044,0.0045,0.0044,0.0062,0.0099,0.0096,0.0100,0.0130,0.0231,0.0704,0.0888,0.1852,0.0765,0.1449,0.2645,0.1823,0.1275,0.1275,0.0948,0.1323,0.1791,0.1969,0.2129,0.2129,0.2034,0.0909,0.0734,0.0817,0.0364,0.0160,0.0086,0.0066,0.0065,0.0073,0.0046,0.0036,0.0041,0.0057,0.0039,0.0030,0.0017,0.0024,0.0024,0.0031,0.0026,0.0022,0.0027,0.0031,0.0022,0.0031,0.0034,0.0036,0.0029,0.0020,0.0017,0.0023,0.0031,0.0025,0.0025,0.0025,0.0025,0.0040,0.0040,0.0026,0.0023,0.0027,0.0031,0.0031,0.0043,0.0038,0.0039,0.0038,0.0044,0.0066,0.0066,0.0073,0.0073,0.0070,0.0088,0.0088,0.0115,0.0138,0.0080,0.0057,0.0058,0.0051,0.0045,0.0033,0.0034,0.0028,0.0028,0.0028,0.0029,0.0024,0.0019,0.0027,0.0025,0.0020,0.0023,0.0023,0.0020,0.0016,0.0023,0.0030,0.0036,0.0036,0.0033,0.0037,0.0052,0.0042,0.0047,0.0068,0.0047,0.0046,0.0070,0.0053,0.0046,0.0060,0.0072,0.0054,0.0052,0.0049,0.0061,0.0048,0.0045,0.0042,0.0057
